name: Snake Console Base game
description:
Classic snake game made only by windows CMD with Microsoft windows batch programming language

Without any other libraries    

This project represents the beginning of computer “main frame” it works without any graphical user interface it bases in very old console

Made only with windows CMD and Notepad they building windows

 

Game size = 64KB

 

Controls Use the letters you see in the screen to start the game and WASD to move and you can customize everything in the controls and graphics
